name: augmented-tabflow
description: Augment your tab workflow with extended tab group managment

scripts.build: cp manifest-dev.json public/manifest.json && vite build --outDir dist-dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "nodemon --watch public --ext js,json,png,html --exec 'cp manifest-dev.json public/manifest.json && vite build --outDir dist-dev --watch --sourcemap true --minify false'" "tsc --watch"
scripts.package: cp manifest-prod.json public/manifest.json && vite build && zip -r augmented-tabflow.zip dist/ && rm -rf dist

author: Paul Amoah
